imdb.plot outline: "The Salvagemasters" series follows salvage teams as they deploy to the scenes of maritime disasters to solve the biggest engineering challenges on the high seas today. A 3 - season (17 - episodes) series on ship wrecks, ship salvages and ship arechology.
imdb.title: Salvage Masters
plot: "The Salvagemasters" series follows salvage teams as they deploy to the scenes of maritime disasters to solve the biggest engineering challenges on the high seas today. A 3 - season (17 - episodes) series on ship wrecks, ship salvages and ship arechology.

"The Salvagemasters" series follows salvage teams as they deploy to the scenes of maritime disasters to solve the biggest engineering challenges on the high seas today. A 3 - season (17 - episodes) series on ship wrecks, ship salvages and ship archeology.
